messages.message: Hi Team, can someone help me understand how to determine if 22.08 has been approved for production use?  @Saikat would like to upgrade the PetsBest sandbox to 22.08 for new features. CC @Kyra Harney
not sure about the term `approved for production use` but 22.08 is not GA yet, we are actually working on a new GA release candidate of 22.08.2 at the moment
Thank you!  Do you have any ideas of what the timeline would be for the GA release of 22.08.2?

22.08.2 RC is planned to be deployed to instabase.com (http://instabase.com) by tomorrow (I am about to send out an email about it). If the testing goes well, the current plan is that we are going GA 22.08 next Wednesday cc @aneesh
